summary: Vanilla-friendly ENB configuration based off Kyo\'s Kountervibe running off ENB v.198
descriptionHtml:
[color=red][b]Uses ENB 0.198.  [/b][/color]
[color=yellow]
-----------------------------------
Description
-----------------------------------
[/color]
[color=green][b]This config is basically just a tweaking of Kyo\'s Kountervibe. 

 I liked the color choices made in Epic Natural ENB, so I stole the RGB values from his enbeffects.fx file.  EDIT:  Was told Epic Natural was a Somber ENB rip, so perhaps i borrowed from them, I dunno, I tried Somber and didn\'t like it.  Either way, borrowing the Green value of 0.985 from the enbeffects.fx file doesn\'t make me a thief, or does it?

 I liked the sky and day/night work done in Tundra ENB, so I borrowed a little from it as well.  I don\'t like the heavy use of bloom in Kountervibe, so I toned it down.  I also reduced the quality of the DOF and SSAO from Kountervibe to buy a couple FPS.  I don\'t really see a quality difference.  Nights are similar to Epic Natural, maybe a little darker, same with interiors.  This config does use Kountervibe\'s SweetFX, but I turned most of the effects off aside from SMAA, I think it provides a crisper image and it bought me a couple FPS.

Potential adopters should be warned that I have toned down interior and exterior nighttime lighting substantially.  I think it adds realism, but many folks don\'t like things too dark.  It also effects torches, they\'re no longer LED spotlights.

I didn\'t supply a ton of screenshots as the only way to tell if you like an ENB is to load it up real quick and run around.  I suggest curious visitors to do the same. [/b][/color]

-----------------------------------
My Specs:
-----------------------------------

I\'m running a mid-range desktop with a mid-range GPU:

i5 3570k OC\'d to ~3.8ghz
8gb RAM
Nvidia GTX 670 4gb VRAM

I get around 45ish FPS outside

-----------------------------------
Rant:
-----------------------------------

[color=red]
Manual Installation ONLY -- Uses ENB 0.198

I have no idea how this config will work with lighting mods like RLO or COT, I don\'t use them.
[/color] 

[color=red]

-----------------------------------
Credits:
-----------------------------------
[/color]
Boris Vorontsov - ENB Code Ninja
Kyo of KENB and Kountervibe
wiplashwang\'s Tundra ENB
author: Chidosity
